channel.title: Identity and Authorization :: C# Web Development
channel.description: While this chapter is focused on authentication, you may find yourself wanting to use Identity to limit pages to logged-in users Authorization allows us to restrict access to pages by allowing only logged in users to see them. While this can be a very complex process, ASP.NET has two simple attributes that allow us to restrict access to pages to only logged in users. [Authorize] is an attribute that limits access to content to only logged in users.
